title: Face in this logo?
content:
Need some help identifying the face in this logo so I can recreate it for them since they do not have an EPS.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Pipe.JPG](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Pipe.JPG) | 6.98 KB |
author: jeffwhite

comments.content: This looks like it’s based on Gill Sans.

yeah, i think it’s totally custom, so i just redrew it in Freehand. I should have done that to start with. Instead I wasted over an hour looking.

Thanks for your help.
